column5: Abby’s Place is nestled on an acre of land, 1½ blocks off of Main Street. Peaceful retreat minutes from downtown. Rent all 5 suites for up to 20 people. Suites 1-3 are connected. Suites 4 & 5 are adjoining behind. Each suite has a separate bedroom with TVs & living areas with queen sofa beds. Antique furnishings in each. Suite 3 has 65” TV, fireplace, exercise room, large kitchen with double oven & dining area seating for 16. Back patio has a propane grill, wood-burning fire pit & windmill.
